WRITING.TITLE: Please up the champs select time for casual queue
WRITING.TEXT:
Barely have enough time to think about comp and map. It's like the game assume you already knew which champ to pick once you hit the accept button.
I was waiting to find out which healer my team is gonna play to pick a suitable tank, the guy decided to wait until there's 5s left. Then i picked mine, realized i misclicked, a buy order popped up because i hadn't unlocked Makoa yet, then came 30 minutes deserter penalty.
Then came me http://imgur.com/gallery/M3wJ6Ii

WRITING.TITLE: Writing polymorphic classes data to a .txt file [C++]
WRITING.TEXT:
I have a parent "Employee" class with 2 children that are "FullTime" and "PartTime" and a vector *employee storing all the infomation of current employees. How do i write the vector to a .txt file with the following format
* Number of Part time employee
List of part time employees
* Number of Full Time emplyee
List of full time employees
well Trump's presidency starts in 2017

WRITING.TITLE: It would be really cool if they release Combat Tonics as gemstore items
WRITING.TEXT:
The Endless Kodan Tonic has been hands down one of the coolest ingame reward, and i would gladly pay real money to be able to play as other races, for example a land-largos of some sort ( or \*cough\* tengu \*cough\* ).
Also can we make Infinite Watchknight Tonic last forever, pretty please ?
step up your game i have never seen snow ,hah. *cry*

WRITING.TITLE: [Ningen - Japan myth]. True or not, the creature still scare me shitless

WRITING.TEXT: Jeez tone it down a lil bit won't you

Worst: I have always thought i deserved better, not from everyone but from my family. I thought my family would have the obligation to be emotionally + financially supportive of me. Therefore i tended to blame them for my depression and insecurity, when i should have obviously kept it to myself and be absolutely independent.
Best: My cooking is hella lit

oh my god you sick fuck, people like you should be put in jail
But seriously though, this is probably the most innocent thing i have read on this sub
me too thanks

dude you gotta train your mental state to be stronger, because i guarentee you things way way worse are waiting you ahead.
You failed, nothing else, dont try and sugar coat it with nice words. Just get up and try again.

WRITING.TITLE: Going bald at 20, please help
WRITING.TEXT:
My hair loss has been happening since highschool, and recently it is getting more serious. My hair is already extremely thin, and i afraid it will be comepletely gone by my 20th birthday
If you have any experience on this condition, please do share with me.
Edit: So i was reading wiki and found a pretty [depressing fact](http://imgur.com/a/MnOUY)
Vietnam

It's kinda unfair since their "being who they are" is giving them so much advantage in my field of work ( at least in my country ). Secretly i also wish i could just be myself and life would still be fine, but as many of us know that's not how things work.

WRITING.TITLE: How do straight men do it ?
WRITING.TEXT:
Displaying masculinity without any effort.
I have seen so many male being a total mess in life but is still somehow assertive, confident and resourceful. I have to be self-concious about everything i do to try and achieve that ( the way i dress, speak, act etc..), and even so i can barely keep up with it. Is it because of the lack of male hormones, or some external factor ?
This isn't a rant, just me genuiely asking for an explaination.
I was trying to fix the unable to move bug, which i succeeded by repairing the game client

WRITING.TITLE: Help please, i can't move my character after entering the Temple of Scriptures
WRITING.TEXT:
My character would just stand there. I can still /sit, idle animation still play but clicking will not move him. This happen 100% of the time i enter the temple, logging out is the only way to un-stuck my char.
edit: i can still click and talk to Jenry Hones

i really recommend building a UI game, such as a simple farming simulator. Hardest part is a working inventory + farming land, everything else you can pretty much figure it out for yourself
Edit: I used the inventory guide by Shaun Spalding on Youtube, then edit the same code for my land

WRITING.TITLE: Some question from a complete newbie about the study plan that appeared on the front page recently
WRITING.TEXT:
[This](https://www.reddit.com/r/learnprogramming/comments/56lqa3/githubcomjwashamgoogleinterviewuniversity_a/) is the post i was mentioning
He shared the materials on Github, and because i have never used GitHub before (or maybe i am stupid), the format was too confusing for me. I managed to download the "repository" but the some files are ".md". I tried opening them with notepad++ but all the hyperlink and bullet list are messed up. Do i have to download something else to run ?
He also shared his ["Flashcards site repo"](https://github.com/jwasham/computer-science-flash-cards), which, he said, contained his own database of flashcards and a tool to create my own. I have no idea how to use this either. I would be really grateful if you guys can guide me through all this stuff.
stay sane
Not a "swan" at all, but just simply buying clothes that fit help tremendously with my appearance
